results.content: ## Abridge Inc - About the company Abridge Inc is a series E company based in Pittsburgh (United States), founded in 2018byZachary Zack Lipton, Florian Metze, Shivdev Rao and Sandeep Konam. Abridge Inc has raised $773M in funding from investors like Lightspeed Venture Partners, Redpoint Ventures and Andreessen Horowitz, with a current valuation of $5.3B. | 1st | Abridge Inc 2018, Pittsburgh (United States), Series E | Provider of AI-based health record platform | $773M | IVP, CapitalG & 30 others | 70/100 | Abridge Inc is a funded company, having raised a total of $773M across 6 funding rounds to date. Abridge Inc's latest funding was a $316M Series E round on Jun 12, 2025, led byAndreessen Horowitz.

results.title: Abridge | LinkedIn
results.content:
Overview:
Abridge was founded in 2018 with the mission of powering deeper understanding in healthcare. Our Best in KLAS AI-powered platform was purpose-built for medical conversations, improving clinical documentation efficiencies while enabling clinicians to focus on what matters most—their patients. Our enterprise-grade technology transforms patient-clinician conversations into structured clinical notes in real-time, with deep EMR integrations. Powered by Linked Evidence and our purpose-built, auditable AI, we are the only company that maps AI-generated summaries to ground truth, helping providers quickly trust and verify the output. As pioneers in generative AI for healthcare, we are setting the industry standards for the responsible deployment of AI across health systems.

Website: https://www.abridge.com/
